## blockRendering.Drawer.drawRightSideRow\_() method

Add steps for the right side of a row that does not have value or statement input connections.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected drawRightSideRow_(row: Row): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  row | [Row](./blockly.blockrendering.row.md) | The row to draw the side of. |

**Returns:**

void
